extendedInfo.description: Vodio is your personal video curator keeping you up-to-date with everything you're interested in by matching your personal taste and preferences. With a slick and intuitive interface, Vodio combines all of your favorite video sources into a simple, fun and easy-to-use system so you can discover, watch and share the best videos from all over the web. Itâs like having your own personal video manager on your Android device! FROM THE MEDIA:"What's a five-letter word for must-have app for those who love watching online video?" - USA Today"My Highlights feed was full of stuff that I was interested in watching." - MashableHOW IT WORKSVodio tracks videos as theyâre shared by thousands of people and sources around the world, and organizes them into categories, including: most popular, entertainment, tech, music, sports, news, comedy, science and more. Simply swipe through Vodioâs huge variety of channels and discover videos to enjoy â anytime, anywhere. INTUITIVE ENGINEVodioâs intuitive engine learns from your preferred viewing choices and your social profile and presents you with suggested videos. Itâs a completely automatic way for you to discover countless videos that youâd likely NEVER find without help from Vodio!  SOCIAL SHARINGFeel like sharing your favorite videos with friends? Vodio makes social sharing via Facebook, Twitter and email quick and easy! You can also discover what your friends are watching and enjoying.FEATURES:â Personalized Video Channels - constantly adapting to suit your taste and preferencesâ Real-Time - Always updated with the freshest and latest video content from all over the webâ Beautiful Design: Experience the most amazing and intuitive UI that made the app loved by allâ Vertical Curated Channels - Get a quick overview on any given category such as news, tech, sports, music, science, comedy and more â Highlights Channel - Enjoy the best video content from all your channels, feeds and interestsâ Highly Customizable - Add content from a huge variety of hundreds of channels â Search - Add even more content by turning any given topic, YouTube, Facebook or Twitter page into a video channel â Save Videos - Save any video to watch laterCONNECT WITH USQuestions? Comments? Connect with us at http://www.vod.io

reviews.title: Multitasking error
reviews.comment: Ok I love this app but this error is making it useless. If I leave the app, I can\'t come back to the app using the Android multitasking options. Have to go to apps and launch it again. Which loads the whole app again. And no I don\'t use any task killing apps.
reviews.author: Muhammad Bilal

reviews.title: Why does the app close itself when out of focus
reviews.comment: It makes it impossible to multitask or come back to the video that you were watching if the app closes itself when you go do something else.
reviews.author: Javier Romero

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: perfect  I would like if the U I was more live ! like win 8 metro
reviews.author: Lahiru Samarakkody

reviews.title: Oh my lanta \342\212\231.\342\212\231
reviews.comment: This app...one word...AMAZING! It has a plethora of videos for my viewing that pertain to topics I love! I have nothing negative to say about this app. I am beyond thrilled and very pleased with it. Thaaaank you creators of Vodio!!!
reviews.author: Teresa Cruz

reviews.title: Holy sh**
reviews.comment: This app is simply amazing like everything you ever need inside an mobile app. What has the world come to. Developers you have my thanks for making this so enjoyable for me. I spent hours on it, the first time I downloaded it. Simply beautiful! One problem I noticed but isn\'t major, it doesn\'t show up in the multitasking/app switching part of my phone.
reviews.author: vlad kozlov

reviews.title: Great content
reviews.comment: The vids served up are acually pretty interesting / entertaining. So as long as they dont start slipping in ads its all good.
reviews.author: Andy Kerr

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Have some force close issues but enjoy the app when it\'s working. Great design, intuitive controls.
reviews.author: Caleb Buckley

reviews.title: Simple And Amazing!
reviews.comment: I needed a app to keep me up to date with whats going on in the world and this app does that plus more, this app is amazing if u need a cool app that keeps u up to date with the world. This is it, thank u vodio creators for such a amazing app
reviews.author: Shane Hobby

reviews.title: Almost a 5 star app
reviews.comment: It\'s very interesting, I just do not like the GUI, and the app itself could use some work. I\'m on a Nexus 4.
reviews.author: Last House

reviews.title: Great innovation
reviews.comment: I think this is closest to whay the next generation of online video will be.  Keep working on this app I think you have a grand slam homerun here!
reviews.author: Rob Koons

reviews.title: Won\'t install- edit needed more space for some reason
reviews.comment: Says insufficient storage space but I have 40mb free internal and 1.5gb sd card.  What are the requirements? Edit: I deleted some apps and freed up close to 60 additional meg and it installed. Love it!
reviews.author: darren perkins

reviews.title: Dope
reviews.comment: Crashes on S2 on launch sometimes. But overall my go-to app for videos
reviews.author: Kevin La

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: An great app to have I give it 5 star all days to keep busy on an regular day an entertain.if you want to keep up with latest music , news, etc..you won\'t regrat it ...aka stubbs
reviews.author: Quincy Stubbs

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Tried out the app today and loved it! This app will be perfect when chromecast is implemented and I can watch the videos on my tv.
reviews.author: Diego Torres

reviews.title: One of the best
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app could spent all day on it would give more then 5 stars if i could you wont find a better one
reviews.author: Aidan Fitzgerald

reviews.title: Thank God
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this for over a year to c out me to andriod. This is a game changer for android users. You tablet has a new life.
reviews.author: Optimus Prime

reviews.title: Top 5 app
reviews.comment: I love this app! Everything you could possibly be interested in is in this app!
reviews.author: Suge Jones

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: I love the concept but I wish you could have more pages
reviews.author: Zo Hayes

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Its a wonderfull appilication...but different on android than iso its more flunet
reviews.author: Hydary Muganzi
